Attribute.Name: TotalNumberOfRecords
Attribute.Description: Total number of records that match the input criteria.

Attribute.Name: BeyondLeadTimeLevel1Action
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 Inventory Monitor has been replaced by Realtime Availability Monitor.
Action to perform when available quantity beyond lead time is less then or equals to BEYOND_LEAD_TIME_LEVEL1_QTY.

Attribute.Name: BeyondLeadTimeLevel1Qty
Attribute.Description:
Deprecated. As of 9.5 Inventory Monitor has been replaced by Realtime Availability Monitor.
Level 1 quantity to monitor for inventory beyond the lead time.

Attribute.Name: InventoryMonitorRuleType
Attribute.Description:
The type of the inventory monitor rule. Default value: ACTION. Values:
EVENT - used for the event based monitor.
ACTION - Deprecated. As of 9.5 this has been replaced by EVENT. used for the action based monitor.
